au.edu.federation.caliko.visualisation

Class FabrikLine3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.federation.caliko.visualisation.FabrikLine3D

  • public class FabrikLine3D
extends Object
    A static class used to draw a 3D lines to represent FabrikBone3D, FabrikChain3D or FabrikStructure3D objects.

    These draw methods are only provided to assist with prototyping and debugging.

    The GLSL shaders used to draw the lines require a minimum OpenGL version of 3.3 (i.e. GLSL #version 330).

    Version:
    0.4 - 11/01/2016
    Author:
    Al Lansley

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public static void draw(FabrikBone3D bone,
                        Mat4f mvpMatrix)
        Draw this bone as a line.

        The line will be drawn in the colour and line width as taken from the bone.

        Parameters:
        bone - The bone to draw.
        mvpMatrix - The ModelViewProjection matrix with which to draw the bone.
        See Also:
        FabrikBone3D.setColour(Colour4f), FabrikBone3D.setLineWidth(float), Mat4f.createPerspectiveProjectionMatrix(float, float, float, float), Mat4f.createPerspectiveProjectionMatrix(float, float, float, float, float, float)

      • draw

        public static void draw(FabrikBone3D bone,
                        float lineWidth,
                        Mat4f mvpMatrix)
        Draw this bone as a line using a specific line width.

        The line will be drawn in the colour as taken from the bone.

        Parameters:
        bone - The bone to draw.
        lineWidth - The width of the line use to draw the bone.
        mvpMatrix - The ModelViewProjection matrix with which to draw the bone.

      • draw

        public static void draw(FabrikBone3D bone,
                        Colour4f colour,
                        float lineWidth,
                        Mat4f mvpMatrix)
        Draw this bone as a line using a specific colour and line width.

        The line will be drawn in the colour and line width as taken from the provided arguments.

        Parameters:
        bone - The bone to draw.
        colour - The colour to draw the bone.
        lineWidth - The width of the line use to draw the bone.
        mvpMatrix - The ModelViewProjection matrix with which to draw the bone.
        See Also:
        Mat4f.createOrthographicProjectionMatrix(float, float, float, float, float, float)

      • draw

        public static void draw(FabrikChain3D chain,
                        Mat4f mvpMatrix)
        Draw the provided IK chain as a series of lines using the colour and line width properties of each bone.
        Parameters:
        chain - The chain to draw.
        mvpMatrix - The ModelViewProjection matrix with which to draw the chain.
        See Also:
        Mat4f.createOrthographicProjectionMatrix(float, float, float, float, float, float)

      • draw

        public static void draw(FabrikChain3D chain,
                        float lineWidth,
                        Mat4f mvpMatrix)
        Draw a FabrikChain3D as a series of lines.

        Each line is drawn using the specified line width, with the colour taken from the bone's FabrikBone3D.mColour property.

        Parameters:
        chain - The chain to draw.
        lineWidth - The width of the line use to draw the bone..
        mvpMatrix - The ModelViewProjection matrix with which to draw the chain.

      • draw

        public static void draw(FabrikStructure3D structure,
                        Mat4f mvpMatrix)
        Draw the provided FabrikStructure3D by drawing each chain in this structure.

        All bones in all chains are drawn with line widths and colours as per their member properties.

        Parameters:
        structure - The structure to draw.
        mvpMatrix - The ModelViewProjection matrix with which to draw the structure.
        See Also:
        Mat4f.createOrthographicProjectionMatrix(float, float, float, float, float, float)

      • draw

        public static void draw(FabrikStructure3D structure,
                        float lineWidth,
                        Mat4f mvpMatrix)
        Draw the provided FabrikStructure3D by drawing each chain in this structure.

        All bones in all chains are draw with colours as per their member properties, but with the provided line width.

        Parameters:
        structure - The structure to draw.
        lineWidth - The width of the line use to draw the structure.
        mvpMatrix - The ModelViewProjection matrix with which to draw the structure.
        See Also:
        Mat4f.createOrthographicProjectionMatrix(float, float, float, float, float, float)
